title: Digital Sum !!
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"123{\color{#3D99F6} 4 } , \phantom{c} 123{\color{#3D99F6}4}56{\color{#D61F06}7}, \phantom{c} 123{\color{#3D99F6}4}56{\color{#D61F06}7}89{\color{#20A900}10}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" 
Naruto creates some of the above number by concatenation of consecutive numbers, he notices such numbers are not evenly divisible by 3 when unit place  number terminates  at 4 , 7 ,10, 13 or in the sequence of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 3m +1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
where  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m\in\mathbb N"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Is it true that the number created in that way is not "},{"type":"text","text":"evenly","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" divisible by 3?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By the first row, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a = b "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" means that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a - b = 0 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then, look at the fourth row."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"He or she divided the number by zero whether "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" a "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" b "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is zero or not."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If you divide a number in a complex number by zero, you'll know it."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"It is UNDEFINED!!!!!!"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 126th Problem 2016

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/lQg6itOE4S-456.jpg?width=1200"}},{"type":"text","text":"
We can use the formula,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large\boxed{d=Vt}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where: "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=distance, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"V"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"= speed and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"t"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=time"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Considering the train that leaves at 3:00 pm:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The total time it travels from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3:00~pm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6:00~pm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" hours. So we have"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d_1=V_1t_1=50(3)=150~miles"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Considering the train that leaves at 4:00 pm:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The total time it travels from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4:00~pm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6:00~pm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" hours. So we have"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d_2=V_2t_2=60(2)=120~miles"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Finally, the distance between them at exactly "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6:00~pm"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d=d_1+d_2=150+120="}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large\boxed{\color{#D61F06}270~miles}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\color{#3D99F6}\boxed{\large\text{answer}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large \text{Distance = Rate}\times \text{Time} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large { d }_{ total }={ r }_{ 1 }{ t }_{ 1 }+{ r }_{ 2 }{ t }_{ 2 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since both trains are travelling in opposite directions, their total distance apart is the sum of the distances they each traveled."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Time between: "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" { t }_{ 1 }: \text{ 3:00 AM and 6:00 AM} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" { t }_{ 2 }: \text{ 4:00 AM and 6:00 AM} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large { t }_{ 1 } = 3 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large { t }_{ 2 } = 2 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large { d }_{ total }={ (50) }{ (3) }+{ (60) }{ (2) } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large { d }_{ total }={ 270 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large \therefore \text{The trains are 270 miles apart.} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
